name: Aeroglitch
description:
Aeroglitch is a level-based 3D hack & slash platformer with a cyberpunk visual style and setting. 

Gameplay is fast paced and centred around wall jumping, short range teleporting and killing enemies in the fastest way possible. 

Aeroglitch was made for the cyberpunk game jam in 10 days, by two people, so there aren't that many levels to play though. If well received, there is a chance that this game will be expanded on in the future.
